author: The Record
title: Amateur ice hockey: Huge test for Avalanche - Hockey
text:
The North Jersey Avalanche are getting a chance to knock off the nation's top junior hockey team â€“ and help a good cause.
The Avalanche, a 16U national squad, will host the Colorado Thunderbirds at 2 p.m. at the Ice House in Hackensack. 
A $10 donation to breast cancer research will be made by each fan who attends.
